meanings.sent1: Everyone is invited to the party, excepting Tom.
meanings.sent2: I like all fruits excepting bananas.
meanings.sent3: The zoo welcomed all animals excepting the invisible ones.
meanings.sent4: The garden was filled with colorful flowers, excepting the wilting ones.
meanings.sent5: The teacher praised all students excepting the ones who didn't complete their homework.

meanings.sent1: The store is open every day excepting Sundays.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy all sports excepting basketball.
meanings.sent3: The chef used all ingredients excepting the secret spice.
meanings.sent4: The library had every book imaginable, excepting the rare ones.
meanings.sent5: The team won every game excepting the final one of the season.
